title: Has the National Republican Army asked the judicial candidates about "position letters" on firearms?
subtitle: The letters of the National Gun Association to judicial candidates in Wisconsin were scrutinized following a mass shooting at the school in February 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The National Republican Army sent candidates to the Supreme Court of Wisconsin a letter urging them to submit a "Statement of Position" on weapons rights, or risk opposing members of the Royal National Army in the state.
